ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( CONTAINS(Description, "auction"), CONTAINS(Description, "copyright"), CONTAINS(Description, "sex"), CONTAINS(Description, "viagra"), CONTAINS(Description, "vkmovie.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "fevgen708@gmail.com"), CONTAINS(Description, "и"), CONTAINS(Description, "Это"), CONTAINS(Description, "seo"), CONTAINS(Email, "mail.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "inbox.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "JasonHok"), CONTAINS(Email, "list.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "bk.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "yandex.com"), CONTAINS(Email, "viagra"), CONTAINS(Email, "bizml.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "yandex.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "list.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "bk.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, "dizaer.ru"), CONTAINS(Email, ".xyz"), CONTAINS(Description, "на"), CONTAINS(Description, "SEO"), CONTAINS(Description, "Россия"), CONTAINS(Description, "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"), NOT(CONTAINS(Email, "@")) )
